dialogues.text: Guess we won't be seeing each other again..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Driver reaches out to give him the bag, when suddenly Ber hand snakes out of his pocket, twisting a switch-blade in Driver's gut. He pulls it out, ready to stab again, but t time Driver catches his wrist, slowly forcing the knife u his throat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Their eyes are fixed on each other for a moment, with som like regret, then the blade pierces Bernie Rose's neck, s deeper and deeper. Driver holds the old man in his arms a dies. They stay like that, locked in a fatal embrace, the Driver lowers Bernie Rose gently to the ground, out of si

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blood seeping through his shirt, Driver picks up the gym puts it back in the trunk, slamming the door shut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're looking down on an enormous parking lot, hundreds o different colored vehicles gleaming down below. Driver pu into the lot, searching for a place to park.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Driver climbs out of his car, wearing a jacket over his b soaked shirt. He walks to the back of the car, kneels dow hides the keys behind the left rear wheel, drops of blood dripping on the tarmac beneath him. He gets up again, the off through the maze of parked vehicles, dialling a numbe his cell-phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Irene and Benicio sit in the park.  IRENE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Picking up her phone) Hello?...  (INTERCUT)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The blazing sun beats down. Driver walks through a long c of glinting cars.  DRIVER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's me...   (CONTINUED) 85 9/24/10 164 CONTINUED: 164

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Irene stares in surprise.

dialogues.speaker: DRIVER'S VOICE ON THE PHONE
dialogues.text: Don't hang up...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She says nothing but stays on the line.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Driver continues painfully through the maze of cars.  DRIVER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You got a pen? I need you to write something down...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Irene looks confused as she hears the quiet urgency in hi voice, then reaches inside her handbag.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sunlight glitters on the roofs of the parked cars, dazzli Driver's eyes.  DRIVER

dialogues.speaker: ...JJT 108...
dialogues.text: DRIVER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's the license number for my car. I've left it in a parking lot on the corner of Culver and Lincoln. Section M 10...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Irene writes down the details, looking even more confused

dialogues.speaker: DRIVER'S VOICE ON THE PHONE
dialogues.text: There's a bag in the trunk with some money. Keys are under the left rear wheel...  IRENE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you want me to do with it?...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Driver walks with difficulty, finding it hard to breathe.  DRIVER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's yours. It's safe to keep it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All around him the Chevys, Dodges, and Fords glitter in t sunlight.  IRENE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told you, I don't need your money...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blood seeps through Driver's shirt, dripping on the tarma

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Irene hears his labored breathing now, looking concerned.   (CONTINUED) 86 9/24/10 164 CONTINUED: (2) 164  IRENE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you okay?...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Driver's skin looks deathly pale, his eyes a haunting sha blue. He keeps walking through the maze of cars, casting eyes from one vehicle to the next, looking for the perfec  DRIVER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just out of breath...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally he spots a beautiful white Camaro up ahead.  DRIVER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How're you doing?...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For the first time we see the Echo Park fountain sparklin the background.  IRENE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine. I'm in the park with Benicio...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Irene can no longer hold back her tears, heartbroken.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Driver stops in front of the white Camaro, unsteady on hi  DRIVER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I gotta go Irene...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pauses.  DRIVER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meeting you was the best thing that ever happened to me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Irene smiles sadly.  IRENE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was nice to meet you too...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From above we see the maze of vehicles stretching out for Chevys, Chryslers, Fords -- the history of America on whe Driver switches off his cell-phone reluctantly then heads towards the Camaro.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Driver climbs into the front seat of the Camaro, catching breath. He sits there a moment, sheltering from the world outside, then pulls out a pocket knife, opening the blade he finds the screwdriver. He starts with the left side of steering column, then gets to work on the section below t signal.  (CONTINUED) 87 9/24/10 166 CONTINUED: 166

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His face shows the strain, but his fingers are as steady ever. A master at work. Finally he breaks into the igniti device, leaning back in the seat to take a rest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're gazing down at the white Camaro from above, waiting to move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Driver's face is completely still now. So are his eyes. H almost at peace. There's a long pause, then slowly he lea forward and turns on the ignition. As the engine comes to we CUT TO BLACK.
